import React from 'react' const ProjectCard = ({project}) => { return (
{project._state === 'CLOSED' ? (

{project._state}

): project._state === 'RESOURCING' ? (

{project._state}

): project._state === 'PROGRESS' ? (

{project._state}

):(

UNKNOWN

)}
{project._submissionDate}

{project._name}

{project._author}
) } export default ProjectCard
